UsingUnoSdk.description: Provides a flag to indicate that the Uno.Sdk is being used.

UnoSingleProject.description: Indicates whether the source project should use UnoSingleProject features including support for the Platform specific directories.

UnoVersion.description: The version of the Uno.Sdk and the version of the core Uno packages to use.

IsUnoHead.description: Indicates whether the project is a head project.

ApplicationDisplayVersion.description: The display version of the application.

ApplicationPublisher.description: Sets the Publisher Display Name in the Package.appxmanifest.

AssetsFolder.description: The folder containing the assets for this project.

PlatformsProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the platform-specific files for this project.

AndroidProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the Android-specific files for this project.

iOSProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the iOS-specific files for this project.

tvOSProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the Mac Catalyst-specific files for this project.

MacCatalystProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the Mac Catalyst-specific files for this project.

MacOSProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the macOS-specific files for this project.

DesktopProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the Skia Desktop-specific files for this project.

WasmProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the WebAssembly-specific files for this project.

WindowsProjectFolder.description: The folder containing the Windows-specific files for this project.

DefaultLanguage.description: The default language for the application.

UnoFeatures.description: Provides a list of features that are enabled for the project.

DisableImplicitUnoPackages.description: Disables the extra targets from being loaded which implicitly add NuGet packages.

DisableImplicitUnoNamespaces.description: Disables implicit namespaces that come specifically from the Uno.Sdk.

UnoDisableFilterWebSdkGlobalUsings.description: Disables the automatic filtering of the Web Sdk Global Using that are brought in for the WASM project.

DisableDefaultUnoResizetizerItems.description: Disables the default items added for Uno.Resizetizer.

DisableMsixProjectCapabilityAddedByProje.description: Disables the Msix ProjectCapability that is added for WinUI.

DisableHasPackageAndPublishMenuAddedByPr.description: Disables Solution Explorer 'Package and Publish' context menu entry from being enabled.

UnoDisableVSWarnBrowserIsFirst.description: Disables the build check in Visual Studio that ensures the Browser target is first.

UnoDisableVSWarnDesktopIsFirst.description: Disables the build check in Visual Studio that ensures the Desktop target is first.

UnoDisableVSWarnWindowsIsFirst.description: Disables the build check in Visual Studio that ensures the Windows target is first.

UnoDisable_RemoveTransitiveWPFDependency.description: Disables removing the transitive dependency to WPF which has a requirement to have net8.0-windows and not net8.0.

UnoDisable_RemoveRuntimeFrameworkInRunti.description: Disables removing the Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App from the runtime configuration file in the output layout. Uno relies on loading WPF dynamically by searching for the WPF assemblies in the .NET SDK install folder.

DisableWinUI8857_Workaround.description: Disables the WinUI workaround for issue 8857.

DisableUno9430_Workaround.description: Disables modification of MtouchExtraArgs for Uno Issue 9430.

DisableXamarinDebug_Workaround.description: Disables modification of MtouchExtraArgs for Debugging.

BaseSize.description: Used to specify the size that will be used as a basement for the resize operations. e.g.: BaseSize="48,48".

Resize.description: Boolean value to say if the asset should be Resized or not. By default, just vector assets are resized by default.

TintColor.description: Color that will be used to tint the image during the resize phase. You can use a Hex value or a named value like `Fuchsia`.

Color.description: Color that will be used as a background color.

UnoDspImportColors.description: Imports a theme file with color definitions.

Generator.description: The type of generator to use for the theme file (a .json/.zip extracted from Material Theme Builder).

OutputPath.description: The path that the theme files should be outputted to.

UnoIcon.description: Provides an icon asset for Uno.Resizetizer to use for the application.

ForegroundFile.description: The path to the image file used in the foreground for your icon.

ForegroundScale.description: The scale factor for the foreground image.

AndroidForegroundScale.description: The scale factor for the foreground image on Android.

WasmForegroundScale.description: The scale factor for the foreground image on WebAssembly.

WindowsForegroundScale.description: The scale factor for the foreground image on Windows.

IOSForegroundScale.description: The scale factor for the foreground image on iOS.

SkiaForegroundScale.description: The scale factor for the foreground image on Skia.

UnoSplashScreen.description: Provides a splash screen asset for Uno.Resizetizer to use for the application.

Scale.description: Used to scale the image that will be used as SplashScreen. This property will be overridden by any platform-specific scale.

SkiaScale.description: Used to scale the image that will be used as SplashScreen on Skia.

UnoImage.description: Provides an asset typically an SVG or PNG that will be resized for use across each target platform.

Xaml.description: Generates a XAML file from the theme file.
